verses.content: Kum sâwmpakhatna, thla thumna, chu thlaa ni khat ni chun, LALPA thu chu ka kuomah a hung tlung a,
“Mihriem naupa, Aigupta lal Pharao le a mipuihai kuoma chun hi hi hril rawh; I ropuinaa hin tu ang am i na?
Ngai ta, Assuria chu Lebanona thingkau ṭha tak nei, Buk hlim nei, dung tieng insâng tak a na; A lêrzîk khawm chu kâu inbuk tak laia chun a um a.
Tuihai chun ama chu a châwm a, li inthûk chun ân ṭhang- tir a, A phunna sîr vêla chun a vadunghai chu a luong a, A tui luongnahai chu loa thing tin kuoma chun a tir a.
Chuongchun, ân sângzie chu loa thing po pohai chunga chawisângin a um a, A kauhai chu a tam a, a zârhai chu tui tam lei chun, An hung inzar suok sei tâwl a.
A kâuhaiah chunglêng vatehai po poin buhai an sep a, A zârhai hnuoia chun rama ramsahai po po chun têhai an nei a, A hlim hnuoiah hnam ropuihai po po chu an chêng tah a.
A kâuhai seizie le a ropuinaa chun chuong anga mâwi chu a na, A zung chu tui tamtaka chun a um sih a.
Pathien huona sidarhai chun ama chu tluk thei naw nih a, Fâr thinghaiin a kau khawm an tluk nawh, Insethingin a zâr khawm a tluk nawh a, A mâwinaa chun ama ang Pathien huonah thing hrim a um nawh.
A zârhai tam lei chun ka siem mawi a, Chu lei chun, Pathien huona um Edena thing po pohai chun ama an îtthîk a.
“Chuleichun, Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; Insâng tienga chun chawisângin i um a; a lêrzîk chu kâubuk sataka chun ân umtir a, ân sâng lei chun a lungril chu suksângin a um a;
hnamhai laia mi thilthawthei- tak kutah ama chu pe suok ka ta; ama chu sawisa ngei a ta, a rîtlona lei chun ama chu ka hnawt suok tah a nih.

Ram dang mi hnamhai ṭisimhai chun, ama chu an sât thlâk a, ama chu an mâksan tah a; tlâng chungahai le phairuom po poahai chun a kâuhai chu an tlah a, a kâuhai po po chu rama tui luongnahai chun an suktliek bawk a; hnuoia hnam tinhai chu a hlima inthawk chun an fe thla a, an mâksan tah a.
Suksieta a umnaa chun chung- lêng vatehai po po chu chêng an ta, ram hnuoia sahai po po khawm chu a kâuhai chunga chun um an tih;

a tâwpa chun tuihai kâwla thinghai po po chun an insâng leiin anni le anni inchawimawi ta ngai naw ni hai a, a kâubuk satak laia chun an lêrzîk khawm chu sie ta bawk naw ni hai a, tui dâwn ta po po chu, an thilthawtheihai chu an in- sâng ang chun ngîr ta naw bawk an tih; vânsama fe thla tahai, mihriem nauhai laia chun, leihnuoi hnuoi tienga chun anni chu thina kuoma pêk an ni ta sih a.

“Lalpa PATHIEN chun hieng hin a tih; Hremhmuna a fe thlâk ni chun, sûnna ka siem a; ama ta dingin li inthûk chu kân khum a, chutaka vadungpuihai chu ka sukchâwl a, tui nasatakhai khawm chu an châwl tah a; chun, Lebanon chu ama sûn dingin ka siem a, chun, rama thinghai po po chu ama lei chun an thidang a.

Vânsama ṭum tahai laia, hrem- hmuna ka pei thlâk lai chun, a tlûkna ria chun hnamhai chu ka sukthin a; Eden thing po po Lebanona thing ṭhatak le ditumhai, tui lo dâwn tahai po po chu hnuoi khingtieng panga chun sukhlimin an um a.
Kâwlhnâma thata lo um tahai kuomah, ama ruolin hremhmuna chun an fe thla ve a; anih, a bân lo ni taha, hnamhai laia a buk hlim hnuoia lo chêng tahai chu.

“Edena thinghai laia hin ro- puina le mawinaah ieng le hin am in inang a? Hnuoi khingtieng panga chun Eden thinghai le chun nang chu sukhnuoi i la ni ding a nih; kâwl- hnâma thata lo um tah, sertan lohai laia chun i zâl ve ding a nih; Hi hi Pharao le a mipuihai chu an nih, Lalpa PATHIEN chun a tih,” tiin.
